content:
I have a list of words and their antonyms in an Excel table, as shown below:
| Word    | Antonym |
|---------|---------|
| Discreet | Flaunt  |
Based on this table, which of the following words is the correct antonym for "Discreet"?
A. Concealed
B. Reveal
C. Hide
D. Flaunt
Based on the table you provided, the correct antonym for "Discreet" is "D. Flaunt."
